name: Golduck
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It is seen swimming dynamically and elegantly using its well-developed limbs and flippers.

attacks.name: Swim
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any {W} Energy attached to any of his or her Pokémon, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokémon instead. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Water Slide
attacks.effect: You may move all Energy cards attached to Golduck to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
